description.zh-cn: 中国现代文学家、小说家、散文家和考古学专家。其祖母为苗族，母亲为土家族，晚年选择苗族为其身份认同。
description.en: A modern Chinese writer, novelist, essayist, and archaeologist. His grandmother was of Miao ethnicity and his mother was of Tujia ethnicity. In his later years, he identified as Miao.

description.zh-cn: 沈从文的妻子。
description.en: Wife of Shen Congwen.

description.zh-cn: 沈从文的长子。
description.en: The eldest son of Shen Congwen.

description.zh-cn: 沈从文的次子。
description.en: The second son of Shen Congwen.

description.zh-cn: 湘西护国联军将领，沈从文的早期上级和支持者。
description.en: A general of the Xiangxi National Protection Army, and an early superior and supporter of Shen Congwen.

description.zh-cn: 中国现代小说家、散文家、诗人，曾在沈从文早期困顿时给予帮助。
description.en: A modern Chinese novelist, essayist, and poet who helped Shen Congwen during his early difficult times.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的著名高等学府。
description.en: A renowned institution of higher learning located in Beijing, China.

description.zh-cn: 中国现代作家，与沈从文、丁玲共同创办红黑出版社。
description.en: A modern Chinese writer who co-founded the Honghei Publishing House with Shen Congwen and Ding Ling.

description.zh-cn: 中国现代作家，早期与沈从文友好，后因沈出版《记丁玲》而关系破裂。
description.en: A modern Chinese writer who was initially friends with Shen Congwen, but their relationship broke down after he published 'The Biography of Ding Ling'.

description.zh-cn: 由沈从文、胡也频、丁玲于1928年在上海创办的出版社。
description.en: A publishing house founded in Shanghai in 1928 by Shen Congwen, Hu Yepin, and Ding Ling.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代一所大学，位于上海。
description.en: A university in modern China, located in Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 中国现代思想家、文学家、哲学家，曾任中国公学校长，并调停了沈从文与张兆和的关系。
description.en: A modern Chinese thinker, writer, and philosopher who served as the president of the China National Institute and mediated the relationship between Shen Congwen and Zhang Zhaohe.

description.zh-cn: 国立山东大学的前身之一。
description.en: One of the predecessors of National Shandong University.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争时期由北京大学、清华大学、南开大学在昆明临时合并而成的一所综合性大学。
description.en: A comprehensive university formed by the temporary merger of Peking University, Tsinghua University, and Nankai University in Kunming during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 中国现代小说家，沈从文在西南联大的学生。
description.en: A modern Chinese novelist who was a student of Shen Congwen at Southwest Associated University.

description.zh-cn: 中国国学大师，曾在西南联大反对提升沈从文为教授。
description.en: A master of Chinese traditional studies who opposed Shen Congwen's promotion to professor at Southwest Associated University.

description.zh-cn: 中国现代诗人、翻译家，笔名穆旦。曾批评引荐沈从文到西南联大任教一事。
description.en: A modern Chinese poet and translator, pen name Mu Dan. He criticized the recommendation of Shen Congwen to teach at Southwest Associated University.

description.zh-cn: 中国现代教育家、作家，曾引荐沈从文到西南联大任教。
description.en: A modern Chinese educator and writer who recommended Shen Congwen for a teaching position at Southwest Associated University.

description.zh-cn: 中国现代文学家、历史学家、政治活动家。其在1948年的批判是导致沈从文中止文学创作的重要原因之一。
description.en: A modern Chinese writer, historian, and political activist. His criticism in 1948 was a major reason for Shen Congwen to stop his literary creation.

description.zh-cn: 中国国家博物馆的前身之一，位于北京天安门广场。
description.en: One of the predecessors of the National Museum of China, located at Tiananmen Square in Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 1966年至1976年在中国发生的政治运动，对社会各方面造成严重冲击。
description.en: A political movement in China from 1966 to 1976 that caused severe turmoil in all aspects of society.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命初期的一场社会运动，旨在破除旧思想、旧文化、旧风俗、旧习惯。
description.en: A social movement at the beginning of the Cultural Revolution aimed at destroying old ideas, old culture, old customs, and old habits.

nodes.id: 中国社会科学院历史研究所

zh-cn: 中国社会科学院历史研究所
en: Institute of History, Chinese Academy of Social Sciences

description.zh-cn: 中国社会科学院下属的研究机构，专注于中国历史研究。
description.en: A research institution under the Chinese Academy of Social Sciences, focusing on Chinese history research.

description.zh-cn: 瑞典汉学家，诺贝尔文学奖终身评审委员，高度评价沈从文并支持其获得诺贝尔奖。
description.en: A Swedish sinologist and a lifelong member of the Nobel Prize Committee for Literature, who highly praised Shen Congwen and supported his candidacy for the Nobel Prize.

description.zh-cn: 由瑞典学院颁发的年度文学奖项。
description.en: An annual literary prize awarded by the Swedish Academy.

description.zh-cn: 美籍文学评论家，对沈从文在中国文学史上的重要性予以充分肯定。
description.en: An American literary critic who fully affirmed the importance of Shen Congwen in the history of Chinese literature.

description.zh-cn: 清代湖南省的一个行政区划，为沈从文的出生地。
description.en: An administrative division in Hunan Province during the Qing Dynasty, and the birthplace of Shen Congwen.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的首都，沈从文逝世于此。
description.en: The capital of the People's Republic of China, where Shen Congwen passed away.

description.zh-cn: 中国现代诗人、散文家。
description.en: A modern Chinese poet and essayist.

description.zh-cn: 与沈从文相识的文人。
description.en: A man of letters acquainted with Shen Congwen.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国山东省的综合性大学。
description.en: A comprehensive university in Shandong Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 天主教会创办的大学，原在北京，后在台湾复校。
description.en: A university founded by the Catholic Church, originally in Beijing and later re-established in Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国湖北省武汉市的综合性大学。
description.en: A comprehensive university in Wuhan, Hubei Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 沈从文撰写的关于丁玲的传记，1934年出版，导致两人关系破裂。
description.en: A biography of Ding Ling written by Shen Congwen, published in 1934, which led to the breakdown of their friendship.

description.zh-cn: 沈从文的祖父。
description.en: Shen Congwen's grandfather.

description.zh-cn: 沈从文的岳父，张兆和的父亲。
description.en: Shen Congwen's father-in-law, Zhang Zhaohe's father.

description.zh-cn: 张兆和的姐姐，沈从文的大姨子。
description.en: Zhang Zhaohe's elder sister, Shen Congwen's sister-in-law.

description.zh-cn: 张兆和的姐姐，沈从文的大姨子。
description.en: Zhang Zhaohe's elder sister, Shen Congwen's sister-in-law.

description.zh-cn: 张兆和的妹妹，沈从文的小姨子。
description.en: Zhang Zhaohe's younger sister, Shen Congwen's sister-in-law.

description.zh-cn: 沈从文的襟兄弟（妻子的姐妹的丈夫）。
description.en: Shen Congwen's brother-in-law (husband of his wife's sister).

description.zh-cn: 沈从文的襟兄弟（妻子的姐妹的丈夫）。
description.en: Shen Congwen's brother-in-law (husband of his wife's sister).

description.zh-cn: 沈从文的襟兄弟（妻子的姐妹的丈夫）。
description.en: Shen Congwen's brother-in-law (husband of his wife's sister).

en: A Study of Ancient Chinese Costume

description.zh-cn: 沈从文在中止文学创作后，转入历史文物研究的主要学术著作，于1981年出版。
description.en: The main academic work of Shen Congwen after he stopped literary creation and turned to historical and cultural relics research, published in 1981.

description.zh-cn: 沈从文与张兆和于1933年9月9日结婚。
description.en: Shen Congwen and Zhang Zhaohe married on September 9, 1933.

description.zh-cn: 沈龙朱是沈从文的长子。
description.en: Shen Longzhu is the eldest son of Shen Congwen.

description.zh-cn: 沈虎雏是沈从文的次子。
description.en: Shen Huchu is the second son of Shen Congwen.

description.zh-cn: 沈宏富是沈从文的祖父。
description.en: Shen Hongfu is Shen Congwen's grandfather.

description.zh-cn: 张吉友是张兆和的父亲。
description.en: Zhang Jiyou is Zhang Zhaohe's father.

description.zh-cn: 张元和是张兆和的姐姐。
description.en: Zhang Yuanhe is Zhang Zhaohe's elder sister.

description.zh-cn: 张允和是张兆和的姐姐。
description.en: Zhang Yunhe is Zhang Zhaohe's elder sister.

description.zh-cn: 张充和是张兆和的妹妹。
description.en: Zhang Chonghe is Zhang Zhaohe's younger sister.

description.zh-cn: 沈从文与顾传玠为襟兄弟关系（妻子的姐妹的丈夫）。
description.en: Shen Congwen and Gu Chuanjie were brothers-in-law (husbands of sisters).

description.zh-cn: 沈从文与周有光为襟兄弟关系（妻子的姐妹的丈夫）。
description.en: Shen Congwen and Zhou Youguang were brothers-in-law (husbands of sisters).

description.zh-cn: 沈从文与傅汉思为襟兄弟关系（妻子的姐妹的丈夫）。
description.en: Shen Congwen and Hans Frankel were brothers-in-law (husbands of sisters).

description.zh-cn: 沈从文出生于清代湖南省凤凰直隶厅。
description.en: Shen Congwen was born in Fenghuang Direct-Controlled Subprefecture, Hunan Province, during the Qing Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 1917年高小毕业后，沈从文进入陈渠珍的部队办理杂事，后任其书记。
description.en: After graduating from higher primary school in 1917, Shen Congwen joined Chen Quzhen's troops to handle various affairs and later became his secretary.

description.zh-cn: 1922年，在陈渠珍的支持下，沈从文离开湘西去北京发展。
description.en: In 1922, with the support of Chen Quzhen, Shen Congwen left Xiangxi to pursue his development in Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 1923年，沈从文在北京大学作为旁听生学习并练习写作。
description.en: In 1923, Shen Congwen studied and practiced writing as an auditor at Peking University.

description.zh-cn: 在沈从文初到北京穷困潦倒时，郁达夫给予了他经济上的帮助和支持。
description.en: When Shen Congwen was impoverished upon his arrival in Beijing, Yu Dafu provided him with financial assistance and support.

description.zh-cn: 沈从文于1924年左右结识郁达夫等人。
description.en: Shen Congwen became acquainted with Yu Dafu and others around 1924.

description.zh-cn: 沈从文于1924年左右结识徐志摩等人。
description.en: Shen Congwen became acquainted with Xu Zhimo and others around 1924.

description.zh-cn: 沈从文于1924年左右结识林宰平等人。
description.en: Shen Congwen became acquainted with Lin Zaiping and others around 1924.

description.zh-cn: 1928年，沈从文与胡也频、丁玲在上海共同创办了红黑出版社。
description.en: In 1928, Shen Congwen co-founded the Honghei Publishing House in Shanghai with Hu Yepin and Ding Ling.

description.zh-cn: 1928年，胡也频与沈从文、丁玲在上海共同创办了红黑出版社。
description.en: In 1928, Hu Yepin co-founded the Honghei Publishing House in Shanghai with Shen Congwen and Ding Ling.

description.zh-cn: 1928年，丁玲与沈从文、胡也频在上海共同创办了红黑出版社。
description.en: In 1928, Ding Ling co-founded the Honghei Publishing House in Shanghai with Shen Congwen and Hu Yepin.

description.zh-cn: 沈从文与胡也频是共同创办出版社的友人。
description.en: Shen Congwen and Hu Yepin were friends who co-founded a publishing house.

description.zh-cn: 沈从文与丁玲早期是友人，共同创办出版社。
description.en: Shen Congwen and Ding Ling were friends in their early years and co-founded a publishing house.

description.zh-cn: 1934年，因沈从文出版《记丁玲》一书，丁玲与他不再友好。
description.en: In 1934, after Shen Congwen published the book 'The Biography of Ding Ling', their friendship ended.

description.zh-cn: 沈从文于1928年至1930年任教于上海中国公学。
description.en: Shen Congwen taught at the China National Institute in Shanghai from 1928 to 1930.

description.zh-cn: 在中国公学任校长期间，胡适调停了沈从文对女学生张兆和的追求，促成了他们的婚姻。
description.en: While serving as the president of the China National Institute, Hu Shih mediated Shen Congwen's pursuit of his student Zhang Zhaohe, which led to their marriage.

description.zh-cn: 汪曾祺是沈从文在西南联大执教时的学生。
description.en: Wang Zengqi was a student of Shen Congwen when he taught at Southwest Associated University.

description.zh-cn: 在西南联大教务会议上，刘文典公开表示看不起沈从文，质疑其担任教授的资格。
description.en: At a faculty meeting of Southwest Associated University, Liu Wendian publicly expressed his disdain for Shen Congwen and questioned his qualifications to be a professor.

description.zh-cn: 查良铮认为引荐沈从文到西南联大任教是缺乏眼光的决定。
description.en: Zha Liangzheng believed that recommending Shen Congwen to teach at Southwest Associated University was a shortsighted decision.

description.zh-cn: 杨振声引荐沈从文到西南联大任教。
description.en: Yang Zhensheng recommended Shen Congwen for a teaching position at Southwest Associated University.

description.zh-cn: 1948年，郭沫若等人对沈从文的批判是导致其宣布封笔、中止文学创作的重要原因。
description.en: In 1948, criticism from Guo Moruo and others was a significant reason for Shen Congwen to announce his retirement from literary creation.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，沈从文受到冲击，其珍贵图书资料被烧毁，并曾被安排打扫女厕所。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Shen Congwen was persecuted, his precious books and materials were burned, and he was once assigned to clean women's toilets.

description.zh-cn: 在“破四旧”运动中，沈从文工作室里的几书架珍贵书籍被全部烧毁。
description.en: During the 'Destroy the Four Olds' movement, several shelves of precious books in Shen Congwen's studio were completely burned.

description.zh-cn: 沈从文于1950年至1978年在中国历史博物馆任文物研究员。
description.en: From 1950 to 1978, Shen Congwen worked as a cultural relics researcher at the National Museum of Chinese History.

relationships.target: 中国社会科学院历史研究所

description.zh-cn: 沈从文于1978年至1988年在中国社会科学院历史研究所任研究员。
description.en: From 1978 to 1988, Shen Congwen worked as a researcher at the Institute of History, Chinese Academy of Social Sciences.

description.zh-cn: 瑞典汉学家、诺贝尔文学奖终审评委马悦然高度评价沈从文，认为他是1988年最有机会获得诺贝尔奖的候选人，并为此奔走。
description.en: Swedish sinologist and Nobel Prize judge Göran Malmqvist highly praised Shen Congwen, considering him the most likely candidate to win the Nobel Prize in 1988 and advocating for him.

description.zh-cn: 沈从文曾于1987年和1988年入围诺贝尔文学奖最后候选名单，非常接近获奖。
description.en: Shen Congwen was a finalist for the Nobel Prize in Literature in 1987 and 1988, coming very close to winning.

description.zh-cn: 文学评论家夏志清对沈从文的文学成就给予高度评价，肯定了其在中国文学史上的重要地位。
description.en: Literary critic Hsia Chih-tsing highly praised Shen Congwen's literary achievements, affirming his important status in the history of Chinese literature.

description.zh-cn: 沈从文撰写并出版了传记《记丁玲》。
description.en: Shen Congwen wrote and published the biography 'The Biography of Ding Ling'.

description.zh-cn: 沈从文撰写并出版了其重要的学术著作《中国古代服饰研究》。
description.en: Shen Congwen wrote and published his important academic work 'A Study of Ancient Chinese Costume'.
